newsitem.title: USA: BankAmerica to buy Robertson Stephens.
newsitem.headline: BankAmerica to buy Robertson Stephens.

text.p: BankAmerica Corp. said on Monday it will acquire San Francisco-based investment banking and investment management firm Robertson Stephens & Co. Group LLC in a deal valued at up to $540 million.

BankAmerica said the transaction is structured so that a substantial portion of the total payments will be used to retain more than 60 key Robertson Stephens officers for at least three to four years after the company becomes part of BankAmerica.
